name: The Sins of the Father
description:
Barcelona, Saturday, May 24, 1952.

Things seem to be looking up in the city of Barcelona. Although the scars of the Civil War, and especially of the post-war period, are visible to those who know how to see them, they are not evident to the newcomer.

A teenager from a good family turns up dead in Campo de la Bota, and the Agents are called in to find the culprits. The strange circumstances of the death soon raise other, more mundane questions that may have echoes in the family's past.
